title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Claims Settlement Requirements Claims settlement procedure: The settlement of claims is a very important aspect of service to the policyholders

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Hence, the Corporation has laid great emphasis on expeditious settlement of Maturity as well as Death Claims

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The procedure for settlement of maturity and death claims is detailed below : Maturity Claims: In case of Endowment type of Policies, amount is payable at the end of the policy period

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The Branch Office which services the policy sends out a letter informing the date on which the policy monies are payable to the policyholder at least two months before the due date of payment

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The policyholder is requested to return the Discharge Form duly completed along with the Policy Document, NEFT Mandate Form (Bank A/c Particulars with supporting proof), KYC requirements etc

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: On receipt of these documents payment is processed in advance so that maturity amount gets credited to the policyholder’s bank A/C on the due date

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Some Plans like Money Back Policies provide for periodical payments to the policyholders provided premium due under the policies are paid up to the anniversary due for Survival Benefit

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: In these cases where amount payable is up to Rs.500,000/-,payments are released without calling for the Discharge Receipt or Policy Document

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Survival Benefit under Jeevan Anand policies up to Sum assured Rs

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: 200000/- is also released without calling for policy bond or discharge form

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: However, in case of higher amounts these two requirements are insisted upon

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Death Claims: If death occurs after three years from the date of risk or from date of revival/reinstatement, the death claim amount is payable in case of policies where premiums are paid up-to-date or where the death occurs within the days of grace

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: On receipt of intimation of death of the Life Assured, the Branch Office calls for the following requirements: Claim form A – Claimant’s Statement giving details of the deceased and the claimant

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Certified extract from Death Register Documentary proof of age, if age is not admitted Evidence of title to the deceased’s estate if the policy is not nominated, assigned or issued under M.W.P

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Act Original Policy Document If death occurs within three years from the date of risk or from date of revival/reinstatement, claimant is requested to contact the servicing branch for additional requirements

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Double Accident Benefit Claims: Double Accident Benefit is provided as an additional benefit to the life insurance cover

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: For this purpose an extra premium of Rs.1/- per Rs.1000/- S.A is charged

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: For claiming the benefits under the Accident Benefit the claimant has to produce the proof to the satisfaction of the Corporation that the accident is defined as per the policy conditions

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Normally for claiming this benefit documents like FIR, Post-mortem Report are insisted upon

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Disability Benefit Claims: Disability benefit claims consist of waiver of future premiums under the policy and extended disability benefit consisting in addition of a monthly benefit payment as per policy conditions

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The essential condition for claiming this benefit is that the disability is total and permanent so as to preclude him from earning any wage/compensation or profit as a result of the accident Claims Review Committees: The Corporation settles a large number of Death Claims every year

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Only in case of fraudulent suppression of material information is the liability repudiated

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: This is to ensure that claims are not paid to fraudulent persons at the cost of honest policyholders

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The number of Death Claims repudiated is, however, very small

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Even in these cases, an opportunity is given to the claimant to make a representation for consideration by the Review Committees of the Zonal office and the Central Office

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: As a result of such review, depending on the merits of each case, appropriate decisions are taken

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The Claims Review Committees of the Central and Zonal Offices have among their Members, a retired High Court/District Court Judge

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: This has helped providing transparency and confidence in our operations and has resulted in greater satisfaction among claimants, policyholders and public

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Insurance Ombudsman: The Grievance Redressal Machinery has been further expanded with the appointment of Insurance Ombudsman at different centers by the Government of India

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: At present there are 12 centres operating all over the country

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Following type of complaints fall within the purview of the Ombdusman any partial or total repudiation of claims by an insurer; any dispute in regard to premiums paid if payable in terms of the policy; any dispute on the legal construction of the policies in so far as such disputes relate to claims; delay in settlement of claims; non-issue of any insurance document to customers after receipt of premium

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Policyholder can approach the Insurance Ombudsman for the redressal of their complaints free of cost

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Page Last Update Date : Tue, 29 Jul 2025 07:48:54 +0000 Claims settlement procedure: The settlement of claims is a very important aspect of service to the policyholders

text: Survival Benefit under Jeevan Anand policies up to Sum assured Rs

text: 200000/- is also released without calling for policy bond or discharge form

   of India.
text: However, in case of higher amounts these two requirements are insisted upon

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: If death occurs after three years from the date of risk or from date of revival/reinstatement, the death claim amount is payable in case of policies where premiums are paid up-to-date or where the death occurs within the days of grace

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: On receipt of intimation of death of the Life Assured, the Branch Office calls for the following requirements: Claim form A – Claimant’s Statement giving details of the deceased and the claimant

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Certified extract from Death Register Documentary proof of age, if age is not admitted Evidence of title to the deceased’s estate if the policy is not nominated, assigned or issued under M.W.P

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Act Original Policy Document If death occurs within three years from the date of risk or from date of revival/reinstatement, claimant is requested to contact the servicing branch for additional requirements

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Double Accident Benefit Claims: Double Accident Benefit is provided as an additional benefit to the life insurance cover

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: For this purpose an extra premium of Rs.1/- per Rs.1000/- S.A is charged

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: For claiming the benefits under the Accident Benefit the claimant has to produce the proof to the satisfaction of the Corporation that the accident is defined as per the policy conditions

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Normally for claiming this benefit documents like FIR, Post-mortem Report are insisted upon

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Disability Benefit Claims: Disability benefit claims consist of waiver of future premiums under the policy and extended disability benefit consisting in addition of a monthly benefit payment as per policy conditions

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The essential condition for claiming this benefit is that the disability is total and permanent so as to preclude him from earning any wage/compensation or profit as a result of the accident Claims Review Committees: The Corporation settles a large number of Death Claims every year

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Only in case of fraudulent suppression of material information is the liability repudiated

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: This is to ensure that claims are not paid to fraudulent persons at the cost of honest policyholders

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The number of Death Claims repudiated is, however, very small

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Even in these cases, an opportunity is given to the claimant to make a representation for consideration by the Review Committees of the Zonal office and the Central Office

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: As a result of such review, depending on the merits of each case, appropriate decisions are taken

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The Claims Review Committees of the Central and Zonal Offices have among their Members, a retired High Court/District Court Judge

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: This has helped providing transparency and confidence in our operations and has resulted in greater satisfaction among claimants, policyholders and public

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: The Grievance Redressal Machinery has been further expanded with the appointment of Insurance Ombudsman at different centers by the Government of India

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: At present there are 12 centres operating all over the country

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Following type of complaints fall within the purview of the Ombdusman any partial or total repudiation of claims by an insurer; any dispute in regard to premiums paid if payable in terms of the policy; any dispute on the legal construction of the policies in so far as such disputes relate to claims; delay in settlement of claims; non-issue of any insurance document to customers after receipt of premium

title:
LIC Claims Settlement Requirements - Guide to Smooth Policy Claims | Official website of Life Insurance Corporation 
   of India.
text: Policyholder can approach the Insurance Ombudsman for the redressal of their complaints free of cost

   of India.
